text.__SUMMARY__: Psychotria glandulifera is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Sri Lanka.
text.Sources: World Conservation Monitoring Centre (1998). "Psychotria glandulifera". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T32569A9715555. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T32569A9715555.en. Retrieved 16 December 2017.
